message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $95. I think it's a great deal and will be very valuable to you.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $88 for the product.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm looking for something closer to my original asking price. Would you consider $92?
I appreciate your response, Alice. Considering our previous discussions, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $90 for the product.
